Check if locale uses comma as decimal separator

Source: R/plot3.R
uses_decimal_comma.Rd

This function returns TRUE if Sys.getlocale() contains one of the countries where a comma "," is used as decimal separator (see Source). This function returns FALSE otherwise.

uses_decimal_comma()

Source

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Decimal_mark#Countries_using_Arabic_numerals_with_decimal_comma

Value

logical

Contents
